credit_line: Gift of the Estate of James Hazen Hyde
title: Clock
provenance: Commissioned by Swedish Match Company for founder Ivar Krueger (1880-1932); purchased by James Hazen Hyde at sale of Krueger estate, 26 October, 1932, Svenska-Franska Gallery, Stockholm, Sweden
description: Terrestrial globe on stepped circular base with figures representing the Five Continents: Asiatic woman with five-headed cobra, Europa with the Bull, African hunter with lioness, American Indian on horseback, South Sea Islander on dophin. Globe encircled by twenty-four-hour equatorial dial with the signs of the zodiac. Silver gilt arrow on globe indicates the time. Winding key also serves as a finial.
name: Clock
